borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Variation of Conditions 2 (Drawings) of listed building consent (ref. 2020/01842/LBC) dated 20th October 2020 for the "Internal and external alterations to the Grade II Listed Town Hall. Repair and restoration of rooms of heritage significance including interventions within the Assembly Hall. Internal alterations to include new platform lifts, doorways and room layouts and general reconfiguration of ground to fourth floor. Alterations at roof level, to include lowering of the courtyard parapet to accommodate new accommodation at roof level and within a roof extension. Introduction of new lift to roof level, fire-fighting lifts and bridge walkways. Repair and refurbishment of the external stone and brickwork facades. The removal of the external access platforms and stairways and reordering of ground floor entrance to enable restoration of North Elevation, and the replacement of selected single-glazed steel windows with double-glazed steel windows".The proposal seeks to amend the signage to the north elevation of the Town Hall.
